summary: The uncompromising Tony and Emmy Award-winner is showcased both on and off stage via rare archival footage and intimate cinema vérité.
cast: Ellen Adler|Alec Baldwin|Bella Botier|Rob Bowman|Louis Bruno|Maeve Butler|Carl Cafagna|Billy Crystal|Allen Davison|Ellen DeGeneres|Tina Fey|David Gale|John Gale|James Gandolfini|Hunter Ryan Herdlicka|Rock Hudson|Paul Iacono|David Jennings|Cherry Jones|Julie Keyes|Ron Kischuk|Nathan Lane|Bill Maher|Ramona Mallory|Josh Marquette|Daniel C. Masianka|Marjorie McDonald|Billy Miller|Tracy Morgan|Russell Nype|Sarah Jessica Parker|Daniel J. Pilksow|Seymour Red Press|Harold Prince|Scott Shachter|Piet Sinthuchai|Elaine Stritch|Melania Trump|John Turturro|George C. Wolfe
title: Elaine Stritch: Shoot Me
